## `brand.yml`

```yaml
color:
  palette:
    blue: "#0085c3"
    gray: "#aaaaaa"
    white: "#FFFFFF"
    green: "#7ab800"
    yellow: "#f2af00"
    orange: "#ff7700"
    red: "#dc5034"
    red-dark: "#ce1126"
    purple: "#6e2585"
    teal: "#71c6c1"
    periwinkle: "#5482ab"
    aqua: "#009bbb"
    gray-dark: "#444444"
    gray-light: "#eeeeee"
  theme:
    primary: blue
    secondary: gray
    light: gray-light
    dark: gray-dark

typography:
  body:
    family: Museo Sans for Dell
  headings:
    family: "Museo for Dell, Trebuchet"
    weight: 700
```
:::
